name: Likewise
body:
### Welcome to Likewise

[Meteor](meteor.com) is super hot right now so I wanted to check it out. I decided I'd start with trying to build a blog for myself to move away from [octopress](http://octopress.org/) and as I was about to start a new Rails app I came across a post on Hacker News about meteor...and the rest, is what it is.

Maybe this will become something, maybe not...right now I'm interested but that might fade away.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
